result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Syris Thomas Birkley

records.addlTxt: Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for LEVEL 5 SUPERVISION.  NO CONTACT with AMR.  All previously ordered conditions of bail remain in full effect.

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a bail/bond hearing.  Arguments made by State and Defendant.  Court set cash bail.  Jury Trial remains calendared on November 14, 2022 at 9:00 AM for first call.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Letter from defendant re:  copies of transcripts.  (Syris T. Birkley - #22011350, Milwaukee County Jail, 949 N 9th St, Milwaukee WI 53233).

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in court for a final pre-trial.  Mr. Birkley appears pro se.  Court ordered the defendant to file witness list by October 31, 2022.  Mr. Birkley requests a bail/bond hearing.  Court scheduled the matter as requested.  Jury Trial remains calendared on November 14, 2022 at 9:00 AM for first call.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley in court. (PRO SE) Attorney James C Griffin in court for State of Wisconsin. Case in court for jury trial. Joinder motion heard as to cases 2022CF2796 and 2022CF503. Arguments heard. For reasons stated on the record Court denies joinder motion.  State request adjournment jury trial. Defendant objects.  Court grants adjournment request. Court sets both of defendant's cases for jury trial. Case adjourned in Branch 2.
Jury trial scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
State's Motion in Limine

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley in court, appeared in person. Defendant appear PRO SE.  James Griffin appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date. Case adjourned, Branch 2.

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley in court Pro Se.  Mark O Thomson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Original Information previously filed. Court entered a plea of not guilty on defendant's behalf. Defendant's makes several objections. Court notes objections.  Case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.
CASE RECALLED:  The Court ordered that the bail money previously forfeited be reinstated and all other conditions remain as previously set.

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley in court, in custody. Defendant appears PRO SE.  Adam Joseph Best appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: West Milwaukee Detective M. Brus. Court took Judical Notice for case 13CF2029.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant plead not guilty. Defendant requests an arraignment date. Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 2.  Arraignment scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on May 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Next court date has been changed from 5/27/2022 to 5/18/2022 at 8:30am. Parties notified.

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley not in court.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Mr Birkley appears to be recording the proceedings of the Court. Defendant refused to follow the rules of the Court and direct orders of the Commissioner. Defendant was ordered to be taken into custody for disturbing the Court and not following the rules. Defendant is remanded and bail is forfeited.
Oral No Contact Order with AMR, Johnekia Morgan

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant appears by Zoom, pro se. Return on bench warrant held. Bail hearing proceeded. Court orders signature bond reinstated. Case adjourned for preliminary hearing, Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant missed court on 04-05-2022.  Defendant has been picked up on warrant and is currently in custody. Case is adjourned for a Return on Warrant on 04-11-2022 AT 8:30 AM, Branch 2.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 10000.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

11:12 am Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley not in court.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. The defendant having failed to appear, the court ordered a bench warrant to issue, any bond forfeited and Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification by the Clerk of Circuit Court.

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley in court.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant appears in court pro se.   Defendant wishes to proceed without counsel.  Upon questioning, the Court finds the defendant competent to proceed and knowingly and voluntarily waives right to counsel. Case adjourned for Preliminary Hearing, Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Recieved and filed Speedy Trial Motion by defendant jf
Status conference on March 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley in court by video.  Matthew Zisi appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. Defendant has refused to be evaluated by SPD. Court ordered case adjourned to the trial court for CAUSE for status as to if the defendant may represent himself.  Status conference scheduled for March 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant left the court before his next court date was given to him. Also he refused to sign the signature bond.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with A.M.R., Johneika M. and I.M.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Syris Thomas Birkley in court with attorney Alejandro A Lockwood friend of the court.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DECLINED TO BE INTERVIEWED FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.
Commissioner advised DNA sample has been obtained from the Defendant.  Court advised Defendant he may qualify to have the DNA sample data expunged if he meets the conditions under Wisconsin Statutes Section 165.77(4).  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 2/16/22 @ 1p
